title: RIOT PLEASE HELP CANNOT OPEN LoL Launcher!!!! Mac Launcher
body:
So ive been playing quite alot of lol lately but today i tried to open my league of legends application and the logo of league of legends pops up but then after a few seconds it disappears so i looked around and there have been forums telling me to go into my contents/LoL/Rads/Projects i followed those file instructions they say to delete everything inside the projects file but not the lol_client_air file but i checked my projects file and theres nothing there that is what the main problem is i think i tried to redownload league of legends but i cant redownload it off the website because it keeps saying that the webpage is unavailable so im just deleting league of legends and opening an OCE.dmg and putting it back on my desktop
so i'm still unable to open lol can someone please help me RIOT PLEASE!!!!

replies.body: I've deduced that this is an internal problem Riot is having, not a fault of the users.
